data.title: Society of Vacuum Coaters (SVC)
data.meta_description:
Society of Vacuum Coaters (SVC) | 1,967 followers on LinkedIn. The Society of Vacuum Coaters (SVC) is a non-profit, professional, technical society with a vision to be the global source for learning, applying and advancing vacuum coating, surface engineering, and related technologies.  Our mission is to promote technical excellence by providing a global forum to inform, educate, and engage the members, the technical community, and the public on all aspects of vacuum coating, surface engineering and related technologies.

SVC offers a wide range of resources to provide vacuum coating professionals opportunities for education, outreach and networking, including:
- The Annual SVC TechCon: Technical Conference, Technology Exhibit, Education Program, Networking.
data.text:
It’s been a long journey, and with each change, TechCon has evolved into an amazing experience! 🌟 Today, we’re diving into the 7 steps of how TechCon comes to life. You’ll see that even before the current TechCon wraps up, we’re already gearing up for the next one. This helps us leverage fresh perspectives and ensures we never run out of time. ⏳ As you know, the 68th TechCon is quickly approaching! 🚀 #TechConJourney #ConferencePlanning #BehindTheScenes #InnovationInAction #SVC #TechCon A special thanks to DHF Technical Products for sharing the image from 1957! 📸 Check it out here: https://lnkd.in/eBFDQWpT

🔍💡From the evolution of vacuum tubes to the cutting-edge world of 1D materials, transistors are more fascinating than you might think - and we depend on them EVERY day! 🤯 Catch a glimpse of one of the many articles featured in last week's SVConnections 📫. #SVC #SVConnections #Transistor #EverydayTech #weeklypost #learn #TechCon

Did you know that the right-hand 🤚 rule in physics was established by John Ambrose Fleming? He also invented the 💡vacuum tube, a pivotal advancement in electronics that came before the semiconductor industry's breakthroughs. Today, semiconductors are predominant, making clean rooms more essential than ever. ⚡️ 🙌Join us as we continue to explore electronics one month at a time. This month, we're excited to introduce Tim Gessert, the third of our five expert instructors 👨🏫! 📚Keep learning, keep growing, and let's make every month a step 👣 towards a brighter, more knowledgeable future 🌱✨. #LifelongLearning #TechEducation #Microelectronics #ContinuousLearning #EdCon2024 #SVC #VirtualLearning #TechGrowth #EducationalExcellence #ShapingTheFuture #InstructorSpotlight #Gessert #Instructor #Vacuum #Contamination #VacuumTube #Electronics p.s. For those who have already seen the post... We're all human, and mistakes happen! 😅 I accidentally posted using a personal LinkedIn account instead of the official SVC account. So, here's the post again under the right profile. Remember, making errors is part of growth— those who don't make mistakes aren't driving change! 🌟🔧

📈 Discover the power of Process Mining and simulations, and learn how to leverage these cutting-edge tools to your advantage. 🌟 Meet the team behind the stunning cover of the 2024 Summer SVC Bulletin! Dive into the latest insights and innovations with PlasmaSolve s.r.o., Adam Obrusník, Martin Kubečka, Kryštof Mrózek, Kristián Farkaš, Kristína Tomanková, and Petr Zikán. We hope to see you next year in Nashville! 🇺🇸 For travel support, don’t forget to check out the Society of Vacuum Coaters Foundation (SVCF). #2024SummerBulletin #Summer #Bulletin #ProcessMining #Process #Simulations #TechAdvancement #Innovation #VacuumCoating #MatSight #ThinFilm #TechCon #support #fundation #2025TechCon #SVC

🪟 Imagine harnessing the potential of our windows more intelligently! 🌞❄️ During winter, let more sunlight in to naturally heat indoor spaces, and on hot days, block out UV light to keep interiors cool. 🌞🕶️ Learn more about Switch2Save and Fraunhofer FEP - the evolution of surface and light. #SmartWindows #EnergyEfficiency #SustainableLiving #EcoFriendly #InnovativeTech #GreenBuilding Learn new things with #SVC 👉 Don't forget to follow us on LinkedIn.

🇺🇸 Last week, we celebrated the 4th of July! 🎆 Maybe you joined the festivities with friends and family. What was your preferred beverage packaging material? 🥫🥃♵ 🤔Did you know that John Stith Pemberton, born on July 8, 1831, was the inventor of the Coca-Cola flavor? 🥤 In 1866, seeking a cure for his addiction, he began experimenting with painkillers that would serve as morphine-free alternatives💊. Coca-Cola FEMSA, The Coca-Cola Company #FunFact #CocaCola #4thOfJuly #BeveragePackaging #Aluminum #Glass #Plastic #Innovation #History #JohnPemberton #SVC

🧠💭 Recognizing the limits of your knowledge can be a strength, as it keeps you open to new information and allows you to adjust your opinions as circumstances change 🌟📚. It's easy to fall into the trap of seeking information that confirms your existing beliefs while dismissing evidence that challenges them 🚫🔄. Want to learn more? Click on the article to discover why quality matters in science, research, and other fields🔍🔬. 🇺🇸 In honor of the upcoming 4th of July, here are four key reasons: 🔍 Accuracy of results, 🔄 Reproducibility and consistency, 🤝 Credibility and trustworthiness, and 💡 Innovation and progress. Before the celebration, look out for our monthly e-newsletter SVConnections! #ScienceMatters #QualityResearch #Innovation #IntellectualHumility #SVConnections #SVC #thinfilm #vacuum #GIGO
